Title: Quick Meeting
Description: Draw 2 cards.

Title: Virtual Meeting
Description: Draw 3 cards and discard 1 of them.

Title: Weekly meeting
Description: Shuffle 1 card from your hand into the deck. Draw 2 cards.

Title: Emergency meeting
Description: Add your hand to the deck and shuffle it. Then draw 5 cards.

Title: Training
Description: Use any 2 meeples to target 3 cards in your hand and decrease their meeple cost of a color of your choosing by 1.

Title: Network restore
Description: Restore 1 Network point to one of your facilities.

Title: Physical restore
Description: Restore 1 Physical point to one of your facilities.

Title: Financial restore
Description: Restore 1 Financial point to one of your facilities.

Title: Harden New Servers
Description: Restore 1 Physical, Network, and Financial point to your Sector.

Title: Enhance Encryption
Description: Restore 1 Financial and Network point to one of your facilities.

Title: Review Access Privilege
Description: Restore 1 Physical and Network point to one of your facilities.

Title: Defense in Depth
Description: Fortify one of your facilities.

Title: Hire Cybersec Expert
Description: Fortify and restore 1 network point on 2 facilities in your sector

Title: Threat Hunting
Description: Remove up to 2 red effects from your facilities

Title: Friendly Restore
Description: If the Doom clock is active you can target an allied facility if not then target one of your facilities. Restore 1 Physical, Network and Financial point on the targeted facility.

Title: Tech Support
Description: If the Doom clock is active you can add the Fortified effect to an allied facility.  If not then you can add the Fortified effect to one of your facilities

Title: Antivirus Deployment
Description: Remove an effect on 1 facility. This card can target an allied facility as well if the Doom clock is active.

Title: System Overhaul
Description: Remove all backdoor effects on your sector and restore 1 Physical, Network, and Financial point to your Sector.

Title: Update software
Description: Draw 2 cards.

Title: Update methods
Description: Draw 3 cards and discard 1 of them.

Title: Phishing
Description: Reduce 1 Network and Financial point of a facility.

Title: Denial of Service
Description: Reduce 2 Network points for each facility with a Backdoor in a Sector.

Title: Keylogging
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor, reduce 1 Physical and Network point per turn from the targeted facility.

Title: Backdoor injection
Description: Reduce 1 Network point from and add a Backdoor effect for 3 turns from a facility.

Title: Physical Attack
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor, reduce 2 Physical points from the targeted facility.

Title: Brute Force
Description: Add a Backdoor effect to all facilities in a sector. Backdoors last for 3 turns.

Title: MITM - Attack
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor, reduce 2 Financial points from the targeted facility.

Title: SQL Injection
Description: Remove 1 effect from play.

Title: Lateral Movement
Description: If a facility has a Backdoor, add Backdoors to all facilities in the connected Sectors. These new Backdoors last for 3 turns. You can only play 1 Lateral movement per turn.

Title: hurricane
Description: All sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 4 then all facilities within that sector lose 1 physical point.

Title: train derailment
Description: All sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 2 then the transmission facility within that sector loses 2 financial points.

Title: fatberg
Description: Water sector rolls a die. If they roll under a 5 then reduce the amount of black and purple meeples the water sector is able to use by half for 2 turns.

Title: strike
Description: All sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then they lose 1 meeple of each color for 2 turns.

Title: raw sewage
Description: Water and Health sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then all of their facilities lose 2 physical points.

Title: wind storm
Description: Energy and Communications sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 5 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical points.

Title: ice storm
Description: Energy and Communications sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 4 then all of their facilities lose 2 physical points.

Title: drought
Description: Energy, Water, Healthcare, and Agriculture all roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical and financial point.

Title: tornado
Description: All sectors roll a die for each facility in their sector. If a facility rolls under a 2 then it loses 2 financial points and all physical points.

Title: heat wave
Description: Water, Energy, Transport, and Healthcare sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 3 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical points.

Title: algae bloom
Description: Water and Health sectors roll a die. If a sector rolls under a 5 then all of their facilities lose 1 physical points.

Title: fed and state relief
Description: All sectors gain 1 meeple of each color.

Title: emergency budget infusiion
Description: All sectors gain 2 meeple of their choice.

Title: State of emergency
Description: All sectors regain 1 overtime charge.

Title: New Management
Description: All sectors add 5 random cards from their discard pile into their deck.
